title: Are Cowboys ready for Playoffs? Biggest Obstacle for Chiefs? Most disappointing team?
itunes:title: Are Cowboys ready for Playoffs? Biggest Obstacle for Chiefs? Most disappointing team?
description:
In the latest edition of the Good Morning Football Podcast, hosts Kay Adams, Kyle Brandt, Peter Schrager, and former NFL running back Maurice Jones-Drew start with an examination on just how good this Dallas Cowboys team is. Then they share their thoughts on the most disappointing team this season and the biggest obstacle facing the Kansas City Chiefs. Scott Pioli joins the show and he shares his thoughts on the firing of Brian Flores, the Bills and Patriots matchup, and the Eagles and Buccaneers matchup. They finish up with the 'Taco Bout It' segment and they highlight Derek Carr and the Las Vegas Raiders; the Cincinnati Bengals defense; the Pittsburgh Steelers logo; and the adversity the New Orleans Saints faced this season.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
